hero.title: Is there a problem with the schedule due to a lack of development manpower

team.title: Customized Team Expansion
team.description: Build a customized team as needed and connect developers that fit your goals.

story1.quote: We can provide various types of resources to companies, resulting in significant cost savings.
story1.description: Substantial cost reduction while maintaining quality.

story2.quote: With a team of 10 skilled professionals, we can complete projects up to 3 times faster.

consultation.question: How does the free consultation process work?

step1.title: 1. Understanding Requirements
step1.content: We assess your project goals, technical requirements, and team size.

step2.title: 2. Custom Matching Proposal
step2.content: We recommend developers or teams that match your needs.

note.content: * Consultation takes about 30 minutes and can be conducted online or in person.

matching_speed.question: How quickly can you match developers?
answers: We match optimal developers within 7 days on average.
For urgent projects, we can match available developers within 48 hours.
Developers join the project after final client approval of the match.

pricing.question: How is developer pricing structured?
answers: Internship developers start from $500 per month.
Experienced developer rates are based on skill level and project scope.
Team packages include management personnel for team hiring.

compensation.title: Competitive Compensation
compensation.description: Fair compensation and performance bonuses based on your skills
